name: My Asian Nanny
address: 216 West Garvey Avenue, Unit #G Monterey Park, CA 91754 (Note: This is a California address, but they serve New York City families.)
description: This agency helps families in New York City hire trusted nannies, Chinese confinement nannies, housekeepers, and more. They offer services like postpartum care, live-in/live-out nannies, and eldercare

name: NannyJi
address: Not explicitly listed for a New York office, but they operate as a referral agency
description: NannyJi is a referral agency for South Asian and Southeast Asian nannies, babysitters, housekeepers, and cooks in New York

name: Care.com (Chinese-Speaking Nannies)
address: Online platform, not a physical location for individual nannies
description: Care.com is a large online platform where you can find Chinese or Mandarin-speaking nannies in New York, with many listed having a 5.0 rating

name: Care.com (Korean Nannies)
description: This platform also lists Korean nannies in New York, with an average rating of 5.0 stars

name: Sishu Mandarin (Connecting to Nanny Agencies)
address: Not a direct nanny service, but connects to agencies
description: Sishu Mandarin helps families find bilingual Mandarin-speaking nannies by connecting them with reputable nanny agencies in NYC

name: Chinese-American Planning Council (CPC) Early Childhood Learning & Wellness Services
Address:
description: This organization provides education, resources, and referrals for child care needs, serving families with multi-lingual staff including Chinese speakers

name: AyiConnect
description: AyiConnect is a platform where you can find nannies and caregivers in New York, including those who are bilingual in Mandarin Chinese

name: Babysits (Asia)
address: Brooklyn, NY (Asia is a nanny listed in Brooklyn)
description: Asia is a listed nanny in Brooklyn with over 3 years of experience, certified in first aid, and experienced with children with special needs

name: Go Au Pair
description: Go Au Pair offers Chinese au pairs, providing childcare combined with cultural exchange. They have been a sponsor of the Au Pair Program since 1989
